body:
<!--

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->

Following the suggestion [made at #1999](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/1999#issuecomment-263386482), I was attempting to write a native command that outputs serialized PowerShell data and ran across a difference between the how the Windows and Linux versions handle whitespace in the CLIXML payload.

Steps to reproduce
------------------

Create a file `foo.xml` with the following contents:

```xml
#< CLIXML
<Objs Version="1.1.0.1" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/powershell/2004/04">
    <I32>12</I32>
</Objs>
```

Use a native command to print the output of `foo.xml` and pipe to `Write-Output`.

```powershell
PS> cmd /c type foo.xml | Write-Output # Windows
PS> /bin/cat foo.xml | Write-Output # Ubuntu
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

Each of the two snippets should display ``12`` to the console.

Actual behavior
---------------

The actual output depends on the host OS and PowerShell version:

```powershell
PS> cmd /c type foo.xml | write-output
12
PS> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      5.1.14393.693
PSEdition                      Desktop
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   10.0.14393.693
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```

By contrast, on Ubuntu, an error is raised:

```powershell
PS> /bin/cat foo.xml | Write-Output                                                                                         
/bin/cat : Cannot process the XML from the 'Output' stream of '/bin/cat': Unexpected end of file has occurred. The following elements are not 
closed: Objs. Line 1, position 81.
At line:1 char:1
+ /bin/cat foo.xml | Write-Output
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : SyntaxError: (/bin/cat:String) [], XmlException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : ProcessStreamReader_CliXmlError
 
/bin/cat : Cannot process the XML from the 'Output' stream of '/bin/cat': Element 'Objs' with namespace name 
'http://schemas.microsoft.com/powershell/2004/04' was not found. Line 1, position 6.
At line:1 char:1
+ /bin/cat foo.xml | Write-Output
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : SyntaxError: (/bin/cat:String) [], XmlException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : ProcessStreamReader_CliXmlError
 
/bin/cat : Cannot process the XML from the 'Output' stream of '/bin/cat': Unexpected end tag. Line 1, position 3.
At line:1 char:1
+ /bin/cat foo.xml | Write-Output
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : SyntaxError: (/bin/cat:String) [], XmlException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : ProcessStreamReader_CliXmlError

PS> $PSVersionTable                                                                                                         

Name                           Value                                                                                                               
----                           -----                                                                                                               
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha                                                                                                         
PSEdition                      Core                                                                                                                
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                                             
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0                                                                                                             
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.15                                                                                                     
CLRVersion                                                                                                                                         
WSManStackVersion              3.0                                                                                                                 
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                                                 
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1   
``` 

On Ubuntu, these errors depend on the whitespace in the CLIXML payload:

```powershell
PS> /bin/echo "#< CLIXML`n<Objs Version='1.1.0.1' xmlns='http://schemas.microsoft.com/powershell/2004/04'><I32>12</I32></Objs>" | Write-Output
12
```

Environment data
----------------

See above snippets.
